title: Trump Rallies His Base & Florida Faces Big Midterm Election Decisions | Dwyane Wade
itunes:title: Trump Rallies His Base & Florida Faces Big Midterm Election Decisions | Dwyane Wade
description:
Floridians prepare to decide whether ex-felons should be allowed to vote, and Miami Heat guard Dwyane Wade discusses his entrepreneurial and philanthropic work.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
